main.title: XXMI Launcher
main.theme_update_message:
Selected {0} theme cannot be loaded!

Click `Use Default` to use default theme instead (ensures proper visuals).
Click `Patch Theme` to replace `custom-tkinter-theme.json` with new one.
main.theme_folder_missing:
Failed to load {0} theme:

Theme folder does not exist!
main.theme_file_missing:
Failed to load {0} theme:

Theme file `custom-tkinter-theme.json` does not exist!

tooltip.unsafe_mode_warning:
Usage of 3-rd party 3dmigoto DLLs is allowed.
Make sure to use ones only from a trusted source!
tooltip.package_release_notes_not_installed: Press **Install** button to setup the package.
tooltip.package_description_launcher: *This package is XXMI Launcher App itself and defines its features.*
tooltip.package_description_xxmi_libraries: *XXMI Libraries package is custom 3dmigoto build fiddling with data between GPU and a game process.*
tooltip.package_description_model_importer: *Model Importer package offers a set of API functions required for mods to work in given game.*
tooltip.importer_folder:
Path to folder containing `Mods` folder, `d3dx.ini` and other {importer} resources.
**Absolute**: Set any arbitrary folder, i.e. `C:/Games/{importer}/`.
**Relative**: Set any folder **inside** the Launcher folder, i.e. `{importer}/` (default).
tooltip.game_folder_wwmi:
Path containing 'Wuthering Waves.exe' and subfolders 'Client' and 'Engine'.
Typically this folder is named 'Wuthering Waves Game' and located in the Wuthering Waves installation directory.
tooltip.game_folder_srmi:
Path to the folder containing 'StarRail.exe'.
Typically this folder is named 'Games' and located in the 'DATA' folder of the Star Rail installation directory.
tooltip.game_folder_gimi:
Path to the folder containing 'GenshinImpact.exe' or 'YuanShen.exe' (CN server).
Typically this folder is named 'Genshin Impact Game' and located in the 'DATA' folder of the Genshin Impact installation directory.
tooltip.overwrite_d3dx:
Enabled: {importer} updates will overwrite existing d3dx.ini to ensure its up-to-date state.
Disabled: {importer} updates will keep existing d3dx.ini untouched.
tooltip.unsafe_mode:
Enabled: Allow 3-rd party 3dmigoto dlls.
Disabled: Disallow 3-rd party 3dmigoto dlls.
Note: If 3-rd party d3d11.dll does not support running from nested directories, it will fail to load.
tooltip.option_enabled_effect:
Enabled: Option will have stated effect.
Disabled: Option will have no effect.
tooltip.run_pre_launch:
Windows console command to be executed before game exe launch.
Note: If something needs to be done before the game start, do it here.
tooltip.wait_for_command: Enabled: Wait for (blocking) command to finish its execution before launching the game exe.
tooltip.custom_launch:
Windows console command to run when Start button is pressed instead of default game exe launch.
Hint: If you want to change injection method only, just leave this field empty.
Warning! This command also overrides `Launch Options` from General Settings.
tooltip.custom_launch_wwmi: Warning! Make sure to pass `Client -DisableModule=streamline` argument to Client-Win64-Shipping.exe to force DX11 mode!
tooltip.custom_launch_example:
Note: If you want to start game exe with another custom exe, do it here.
Example (equivalent for command internally used by launcher to start GI via FPS unlocker):
`start /d "C:\Games\XXMI Launcher\Resources\Packages\GI-FPS-Unlocker" unlockfps_nc.exe`
tooltip.custom_launch_inject_mode:
Defines the way of 3dmigoto injection into the game process started via Custom Launch.
* Inject: Use WriteProcessMemory, more reliable but requires direct memory access.
* Hook: Use SetWindowsHookEx, less reliable, but potentially less prominent for anti-cheats.
* Bypass: Skip 3dmigoto injection and process only Inject Libraries field.
tooltip.run_post_load:
Windows console command to be executed after hooking d3d11.dll to launched game exe.
Note: If something needs to be done after 3dmigoto injection, do it here.
tooltip.wait_post_command: Enabled: Wait for (blocking) command to finish its execution before continuing program flow.
tooltip.inject_libraries:
List of additional DLL paths to inject into the game process. 1 path per line.
Injection will be made via WriteProcessMemory method.
Example (inject ReShade dll):
`C:\Games\ReShade\ReShade64.dll`
tooltip.enable_hunting:
Enabled: Allows to toggle Hunting Mode via Numpad [0] hotkey.
* [d3dx.ini]: hunting = 2
Disabled: Hunting Mode is hard disabled.
* [d3dx.ini]: hunting = 0
tooltip.dump_shaders:
Enabled: Hunting Mode [Copy Hash] key also saves selected shader as file in ShaderFixes.
* [d3dx.ini]: marking_actions = clipboard hlsl asm regex
Disabled: Hunting Mode [Copy Hash] only copies hash of selected shader to clipboard.
* [d3dx.ini]: marking_actions = clipboard
tooltip.mute_warnings:
Enabled: No error warnings or beeps whatsoever. Ignorance is bliss.
* [d3dx.ini]: show_warnings = 0
Disabled: Ini parser error warnings and beeps on F10 will haunt poor souls.
* [d3dx.ini]: show_warnings = 1
tooltip.calls_logging:
Enabled: Log API usage.
* [d3dx.ini]: calls = 1
Disabled: Do not log calls. Maximum performance.
* [d3dx.ini]: calls = 0
tooltip.debug_logging:
Enabled: Super verbose debug logging.
* [d3dx.ini]: debug = 1
Disabled: No debug logging. Maximum performance.
* [d3dx.ini]: debug = 0
tooltip.auto_close:
Enabled: Launcher will close itself once the game has started and 3dmigoto injection has been confirmed.
Disabled: Launcher will keep itself running.
tooltip.launch_options_tooltip: Command line arguments passed to the game executable when launching.
tooltip.launch_options_docs: View more information about available launch options.
tooltip.github_token:
Personal access token for increased GitHub API limits, helps to bypass API request limitations.
You can create a new token on GitHub website with just public repositories read permission.
tooltip.github_token_button: Open GitHub Personal Access Token creation webpage.
tooltip.detect_game_folder: Try to automatically detect existing installation folders
tooltip.process_priority:
Controls the process priority of the game when launched via launcher.
Higher values provide better performance at the cost of other applications.

Warning: Setting to "High" might cause system instability for weaker PCs.
tooltip.unlock_fps_wwmi:
Unlocks the game's framerate using SpecialK.
If enabled, the launcher starts the game via SpecialK and sets fps limit to 120.
tooltip.unlock_fps_srmi:
Unlocks the game's framerate using SpecialK.
If enabled, the launcher starts the game via SpecialK and sets fps limit to 120.
tooltip.unlock_fps_gimi:
Unlocks the game's framerate using GIPF Unlocker.
If enabled, the launcher starts the game via GI FPS Unlocker.
tooltip.unlock_fps_window_mode:
Choose window mode for the FPS Unlocker:
 - Fullscreen: Exclusive fullscreen mode
 - Borderless: Borderless window (fake fullscreen)
 - Window: Windowed mode
tooltip.apply_tweaks:
Improves game performance by modifying Engine.ini with additional settings.

Launcher adds the following sections to Engine.ini:
[/Script/Engine.StreamingSettings]
s.AsyncLoadingThreadEnabled=True

[/Script/Engine.Engine]
bSmoothFrameRate=False
MaximumLoopIterationCount=2147483647
bUseFixedFrameRate=False

[/Script/Engine.GarbageCollectionSettings]
gc.MaxObjectsNonEditor=2147483647
gc.MaxObjectsInEditor=2147483647
gc.MaxObjectsInGame=2147483647

Use "üîç Open Engine.ini" to view current settings.
tooltip.enable_hdr:
Enables High Dynamic Range (HDR) in the game.
This setting only works if your monitor supports HDR and Windows HDR is enabled.

Launcher adds `-hdr` parameter to game launch options.
Note: Some HDR-capable TVs might fail to detect proper HDR support.
tooltip.disable_wounded_effect:
Disables the red screen effect when wounded.

Launcher modifies UserSettings.ini to include:
[/Game/HighElves/Config/HighElvesSettings.HighElvesSettings_C]
IsWoundBloodVFXEnabled=False
tooltip.timeout:
Controls how long launcher should wait for the game to show its window after launch.
Game process will be considered as crashed once timeout is met.
Default value is **30**.
tooltip.auto_update:
Enabled: Launcher and {importer} updates will be Downloaded and Installed automatically.
Disabled: Use special [‚ñ≤] button next to [Start] button to Download and Install updates manually.
tooltip.update_channel:
**Auto**: Detect update installation method automatically.
**MSI**: Use native `.msi` installers to install updates.
**ZIP**: Use portable `.zip` archives to install updates.
tooltip.launcher_theme:
Select launcher GUI theme.
Warning! `Default` theme will be overwritten by launcher updates!
To make a custom theme:
1. Create a duplicate of `Default` folder in `Themes` folder.
2. Rename the duplicate in a way you want it to be shown in Settings.
3. Edit or replace any images (valid extensions: webp, jpeg, png, jpg).
tooltip.dev_mode:
Enabled: Launcher will track changes in `custom-tkinter-theme.json` and apply them on the fly.
Disabled: Theme changes will not be tracked.
tooltip.verify_ssl:
<font color="red">‚ö† Disable only if you trust your proxy or whatever else that breaks SSL. ‚ö†</font>
**Enabled**: Validate SLL certificates for GitHub downloads to keep you secure.
**Disabled**: Allow insecure connection vulnerable to man-in-middle attacks.
tooltip.proxy_enable:
Controls how launcher connects to GitHub to download packages.
**Enabled**: Use specified proxy server to access Internet.
**Disabled**: Use default system Internet connection settings.
tooltip.proxy_type:
**HTTPS**: Good old proxy protocol. Offers best security.
**SOCKS5**: Newer and less secure, but excels at bypassing firewalls.
tooltip.proxy_dns:
**Enabled**: Use SOCKS5 proxy connection to route DNS requests.
**Disabled**: DNS requests will be routed through your ISP.
tooltip.proxy_host: Proxy IP address (i.e. `123.12.1.231`) or domain name (i.e. `proxyprovider.com`).
tooltip.proxy_auth:
**Enabled**: Use specified user name and password for the proxy server authentication.
**Disabled**: Do not use any credentials when accessing a proxy server.
tooltip.proxy_user: User name provided by your proxy service.
tooltip.proxy_password: Password provided by your proxy service.
tooltip.configure_game_wwmi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, launcher modifies "Client\Config\UserSettings.ini" adding:
 - `IsPointLightShadowEnabled=False`
 - `IsScreenSpaceReflectionEnabled=False`
 - `SubsurfaceScatteringQuality=0`
tooltip.configure_game_zzmi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, launcher modifies "GraphicsSettings.json" to disable certain post-processing effects.
tooltip.configure_game_srmi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, launcher modifies "AppData\LocalLow\Cognosphere\Star Rail\Player.ini" to disable certain post-processing effects.
tooltip.configure_game_gimi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, launcher adds these commands to d3dx.ini's [Constants] section:
 - `UseBloom=0`
 - `UseFXAA=0`
 - `UseVignette=0`
If disabled, removes these overrides (or keeps them untouched if manually edited).
